# ARAppClipCodeAnchor.URLDecodingState.decoding

**Case**

A state that indicates the continuing process of decoding an App Clip Code’s URL.

## Declaration

```swift
case decoding
```

## Discussion

The App Clip Code anchor’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARAppClipCodeAnchor/url] is `nil` in this state.

## States

- **ARAppClipCodeAnchor.URLDecodingState.decoded**: A state that indicates the completed decoding of an App Clip Code URL.
- **ARAppClipCodeAnchor.URLDecodingState.failed**: A state that indicates the failure to decode an App Clip Code’s URL.
